title: 'Putin's jets over Estonia' and MP calls two-child benefit cap 'spiteful'

title: Speaker makes 'strong and punchy' protest to home secretary over dropping of Chinese spy charges
description: Christopher Cash and Christopher Berry were charged last April under the Official Secrets Act. Charges against them were dropped on Monday.
content:
Commons Speaker Sir Lindsay Hoyle has protested to the home secretary after prosecutors dropped charges against two men accused of spying for China and targeting MPs.
Sir Lindsay told Sky News the decision "leaves the door open" to foreigners spying ... [4041 chars]

title: Brett James: 'Jesus, Take the Wheel' songwriter dies in plane crash in North Carolina
description: Friends and co-artists remember the Grammy-winning writer as "a songwriting force of nature".
content:
Grammy-winning songwriter Brett James, best known for co-writing the 2005 hit song Jesus Take the Wheel, has died in a plane crash in North Carolina.
James, 57, was one of the three people aboard a single-engine Cirrus SR22T when it went down "under ... [1238 chars]

title: Clinical Canada end Black Ferns’ reign and book place in Rugby World Cup final
description: Sophie de Goede spearheaded Canada’s sensational Women’s Rugby World Cup semi-final win against New Zealand that booked their place in the final
content: Canada always had a good chance of beating New Zealand in their Rugby World Cup semi-final but no one anticipated the manner of the win as they dominated the defending champions and played them off the park at times. This was a masterclass by Kévin R... [4031 chars]

title: Will the US tech bromance turn around the UK economy?
description: In the week the UK hosted Donald Trump for a second state visit, the country also rolled out the red carpet for US tech firms.
content:
In the old Camden Town Hall opposite London's St Pancras station, away from the white tie and tails of the pageantry at Windsor Castle, was perhaps the most substantive display of the consequences of Donald Trump's state visit.
